mapper.select: SELECT SORDER.SOHNUM_0 ,SORDER.SALFCY_0 ,SORDER.BPCNAM_0 ,SORDER.BPCNAM_1 ,SORDER.BPCADDLIG_0 ,SORDER.BPCADDLIG_1 ,SORDER.BPCADDLIG_2 ,SORDER.BPCPOSCOD_0 ,SORDER.BPCCTY_0 ,SORDER.BPCSAT_0 ,SORDER.BPCCRY_0 ,SORDER.BPCCRYNAM_0 ,SORDER.BPCORD_0 ,SORDER.SOHTYP_0 ,SORDER.CUSORDREF_0 ,SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 ,SORDERQ.YSOQ_BPCPN_0 ,SORDERQ.YAUTREN_0 ,SORDERQ.QTY_0 ,SORDERP.ITMREFBPC_0 ,ITMBPC.ITMDESBPC_0 ,TEXCLOB.TEXTE_0 ,SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 ,SORDERP.ITMDES_0 ,SORDERP.ITMDES2_0 ,SORDERP.ITMDES3_0 ,ITMMASTER.XITM_IND_0 ,ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0 ,ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON SORDER.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERP SORDERP ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMBPC ITMBPC ON SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 = ITMBPC.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB ON SORDERQ.YAUTREN_0 = TEXCLOB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 = ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 WHERE (SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0+'-'+ CAST(SORDERQ.YSOH_ITEM_0 AS varchar) = #{ProjectNO} AND SORDER.SOHTYP_0 = 'NOR') OR (SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 = #{ProjectNO} AND SORDER.SOHTYP_0 = 'REP')

Select distinct STOJOU.SERNUM_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOJOU STOJOU INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOSER STOSER ON STOJOU.ITMREF_0=STOSER.ITMREF_0 AND STOJOU.SERNUM_0= STOSER.SERNUM_0 WHERE STOJOU.PJT_0=#{ProjectNO} and STOJOU.ITMREF_0=#{PN}

Select distinct STOJOU.LOT_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOJOU STOJOU INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOLOT STOLOT ON STOJOU.ITMREF_0 = STOLOT.ITMREF_0 AND STOJOU.LOT_0= STOJOU.LOT_0 WHERE STOJOU.PJT_0=#{ProjectNO} and STOJOU.ITMREF_0=#{PN}

SELECT AUTILIS.NOMUSR_0, AUTILIS.ADDEML_0, PORDER.POHFCY_0, PORDER.POHNUM_0, PORDER.ORDREF_0, PORDER.ORDDAT_0, PORDER.MDL_0, PORDER.PTE_0, PORDER.BPSNUM_0, PORDER.BPRNAM_0, PORDER.BPRNAM_1, PORDER.BPAADDLIG_0, PORDER.BPAADDLIG_1, PORDER.BPAADDLIG_2, PORDER.POSCOD_0, PORDER.CTY_0, PORDER.SAT_0, PORDER.CRY_0, PORDER.CRYNAM_0, PORDER.CUR_0, PORDER.TOTORD_0, PORDER.TTVORD_0, PORDER.BPTNUM_0, BPCARRIER.BPTNAM_0, BPARTNER.EECNUM_0, BPADDRESS_SUPPLIER.TEL_0, BPADDRESS_SUPPLIER.FAX_0, BPADDRESS_BUY.CRY_0 AS CRY_BUY, BPADDRESS_BUY.TEL_0 AS TEL_BUY, BPADDRESS_BUY.FAX_0 AS FAX_BUY, PORDERP.POPLIN_0, PORDERP.ITMREF_0, PORDERP.ITMDES_0, PORDERP.ITMDES2_0, PORDERP.ITMDES3_0, PORDERP.DISCRGVAL1_0, PORDERP.PJT_0, PORDERQ.EXTRCPDAT_0, PORDERQ.LINAMT_0, PORDERQ.LINATIAMT_0, PORDERQ.QTYUOM_0, PORDERQ.QTYSTU_0, PORDERQ.UOM_0, PORDERQ.STU_0, PORDERQ.YSOQ_BPCSN_0, PORDERQ.YSOQ_PAINT_0, ITMBPS.ITMDESBPS_0, ITMBPS.ITMREFBPS_0, TEXCLOB_ENT.TEXTE_0 AS TEXTE_ENT, TEXCLOB_FIN.TEXTE_0 AS TEXTE_FIN, TEXCLOB_LIN.TEXTE_0 AS TEXTE_LIN FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDER PORDER LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.AUTILIS AUTILIS ON PORDER.BUY_0 = AUTILIS.USR_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPCARRIER BPCARRIER ON PORDER.BPTNUM_0 = BPCARRIER.BPTNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPARTNER BPARTNER ON PORDER.BPSNUM_0 = BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDERP PORDERP ON PORDER.POHNUM_0 = PORDERP.POHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDERQ PORDERQ ON PORDERP.POHNUM_0 = PORDERQ.POHNUM_0 AND PORDERP.POPLIN_0 = PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 AND PORDERP.POPSEQ_0 = PORDERQ.POQSEQ_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPADDRESS BPADDRESS_SUPPLIER ON PORDER.BPAADD_0 = BPADDRESS_SUPPLIER.BPAADD_0 AND PORDER.BPSNUM_0 = BPADDRESS_SUPPLIER.BPANUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPADDRESS BPADDRESS_BUY ON PORDER.BUY_0 = BPADDRESS_BUY.BPANUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMBPS ITMBPS ON PORDERQ.BPSNUM_0 = ITMBPS.BPSNUM_0 AND PORDERQ.ITMREF_0 = ITMBPS.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_LIN ON PORDERQ.LINTEX_0 = TEXCLOB_LIN.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_ENT ON PORDER.TEX1_0 = TEXCLOB_ENT.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_FIN ON PORDER.TEX2_0 = TEXCLOB_FIN.CODE_0 WHERE PORDER.POHNUM_0 = #{PurchaseNO} ORDER BY PORDERP.POPLIN_0
SELECT VATRAT_0,AMTTAX_0 FROM PVCRVAT WHERE PVCRVAT.POHNUM_0=#{PurchaseNO}

SELECT MFGITM.MFGNUM_0, MFGITM.ITMREF_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_IND_0, ITMMASTER.SERMGTCOD_0, ITMMASTER.LOTMGTCOD_0, MFGITM.MFGFCY_0, MFGITM.PJT_0, MFGITM.UOMEXTQTY_0, MFGITM.UOM_0, MFGITM.STRDAT_0, MFGITM.ENDDAT_0, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0, FACILITY.FCYNAM_0, SORDER.CUSORDREF_0, SORDER.ORDDAT_0, SORDER.BPCORD_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.MFGITM MFGITM LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.FACILITY FACILITY ON MFGITM.MFGFCY_0=FACILITY.FCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.OPPOR OPPOR ON OPPOR.OPPNUM_0=MFGITM.PJT_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON MFGITM.PJT_0=SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AND OPPOR.OPPORIVCR_0=SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND OPPOR.OPPORIVCRL_0=SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0=SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON MFGITM.ITMREF_0=ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0
WHERE MFGITM.PJT_0=#{ProjectOrWorkOrderNO} or MFGITM.MFGNUM_0=#{ProjectOrWorkOrderNO} ORDER BY MFGITM.MFGNUM_0

SELECT MFGMAT.MFGNUM_0, MFGMAT.ITMREF_0, MFGMAT.RETQTY_0, MFGMAT.BOMQTY_0, MFGMAT.STU_0, MFGMAT.MFGFCY_0, ITMMASTER.PURTEX_0, MFGMAT.MFMTEX_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0, MFGMAT.MATSTA_0, MFGMAT.BOMSEQ_0, TEXCLOB.TEXTE_0, TEXCLOB_ACH.TEXTE_0 AS TEXTE_ACH_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.MFGMAT MFGMAT LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON MFGMAT.ITMREF_0=ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB ON MFGMAT.MFMTEX_0=TEXCLOB.CODE_0 LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_ACH ON ITMMASTER.PURTEX_0=TEXCLOB_ACH.CODE_0 WHERE MFGMAT.MATSTA_0 !=4 AND MFGMAT.MFGNUM_0=#{MfgNO}

SELECT ATEXTRA.TEXTE_0 AS ATEXTRA_TEXTE, MFGOPE.SCOITMREF_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0, MFGOPE.BASQTY_0, MFGOPE.EXTQTY_0, MFGOPE.OPESTA_0, MFGOPE.OPEUOM_0, TEXCLOB.TEXTE_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.MFGOPE MFGOPE INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON MFGOPE.SCOITMREF_0=ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.WORKSTATIO WORKSTATIO ON MFGOPE.EXTWST_0=WORKSTATIO.WST_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB ON ITMMASTER.PURTEX_0=TEXCLOB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ATEXTRA ATEXTRA ON WORKSTATIO.WST_0=ATEXTRA.IDENT1_0 WHERE WORKSTATIO.WSTTYP_0=3 AND MFGOPE.OPESTA_0 != 6 AND ATEXTRA.CODFIC_0 = 'WORKSTATIO' AND ATEXTRA.ZONE_0 = 'WSTDESAXX' AND ATEXTRA.LANGUE_0 = 'ENG' AND MFGOPE.MFGNUM_0= #{MfgNO} ORDER BY MFGOPE.MFGNUM_0

SELECT ATEXTRA.TEXTE_0 AS ATEXTRA_TEXTE, MFGOPE.OPENUM_0, MFGOPE.EXTOPETIM_0, MFGOPE.EXTSETTIM_0, MFGOPE.EXTUNTTIM_0, MFGOPE.EXTWST_0, MFGOPE.MFGFCY_0, MFGOPE.MFGNUM_0, MFGOPE.OPESTA_0, MFGOPE.ROODES_0, MFGOPE.SCOITMREF_0, SCHEDULING.DACMST_0, SCHEDULING.MFGMST_0, TEXCLOB.TEXTE_0, WORKSTATIO.WCR_0, WORKSTATIO.WSTTYP_0
FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.MFGOPE MFGOPE LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.WORKSTATIO WORKSTATIO ON MFGOPE.EXTWST_0=WORKSTATIO.WST_0 LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB ON MFGOPE.MFOTEX_0=TEXCLOB.CODE_0 LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SCHEDULING SCHEDULING ON MFGOPE.MFGNUM_0=SCHEDULING.MFGNUM_0 AND MFGOPE.OPENUM_0=SCHEDULING.OPENUM_0 AND MFGOPE.OPESPLNUM_0=SCHEDULING.OPESPLNUM_0 LEFT OUTER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ATEXTRA ATEXTRA ON WORKSTATIO.WST_0=ATEXTRA.IDENT1_0 WHERE MFGOPE.OPESTA_0 != 6 AND ATEXTRA.CODFIC_0=N'WORKSTATIO' AND ATEXTRA.ZONE_0=N'WSTDESAXX' AND ATEXTRA.LANGUE_0='ENG' AND MFGOPE.MFGNUM_0=#{MfgNO} ORDER BY MFGOPE.OPENUM_0

SELECT BPCARRIER.BPTNAM_0, SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0, SDELIVERY.SHIDAT_0, SDELIVERY.SALFCY_0, SDELIVERY.SOHNUM_0 AS SOHNUM_ONE, IIF(SDELIVERY.SOHNUM_0='',null,SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0) AS ORDDAT_ONE, SDELIVERY.YBPDTRSP_0, SDELIVERY.PACNBR_0, SDELIVERY.NETWEI_0 AS NETWEI_SDE, SDELIVERY.GROWEI_0, SDELIVERY.WEU_0 AS WEU_DLI, SDELIVERY.EECICT_0, SDELIVERY.CFMFLG_0, SDELIVERY.BPCORD_0, SDELIVERY.BPINAM_0, SDELIVERY.BPINAM_1, SDELIVERY.BPICTY_0, SDELIVERY.BPISAT_0, SDELIVERY.BPICRY_0 , SDELIVERY.BPICRYNAM_0, SDELIVERY.BPIPOSCOD_0, SDELIVERY.BPIADDLIG_0, SDELIVERY.BPIADDLIG_1, SDELIVERY.BPIADDLIG_2, SDELIVERY.BPDNAM_0, SDELIVERY.BPDNAM_1, SDELIVERY.BPDCTY_0, SDELIVERY.BPDSAT_0, SDELIVERY.BPDCRY_0 , SDELIVERY.BPDCRYNAM_0, SDELIVERY.BPDPOSCOD_0, SDELIVERY.BPDADDLIG_0, SDELIVERY.BPDADDLIG_1, SDELIVERY.BPDADDLIG_2, SORDER.CUSORDREF_0 AS CUSORDREF_MULT, IIF(SDELIVERY.SOHNUM_0='',null,SORDER.CUSORDREF_0) AS CUSORDREF_ONE, SORDER.DLVSTA_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_1, SORDER.BPCCTY_0, SORDER.BPCSAT_0, SORDER.BPCCRY_0, SORDER.BPCCRYNAM_0, SORDER.BPCPOSCOD_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_1, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_2, SDELIVERYD.SDDLIN_0, SDELIVERYD.YSOH_ITEM_0, SDELIVERYD.SOHNUM_0 AS SOHNUM_MULT, SDELIVERYD.ITMREF_0, SDELIVERYD.ITMDES_0, SDELIVERYD.ITMDES2_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0, ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_IND_0, ITMMASTER.CUSREF_0, SERREQUEST.YSREITM_0, SERREQUEST.SRETTR_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_ITEMCUS_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_BPCPN_0, SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 AS ORDDAT_MULT, SORDERQ.QTY_0 AS QTY_ORD, SORDERQ.ODLQTY_0, SORDERQ.DLVQTY_0, SPACKD.SERNUM_0, SPACKD.QTYPCU_0, SPACKD.PCU_0, SPACKD.LOT_0, SPACKD.YPCKSNCLI_0, SPACKD.YPKDTEX_0, SPACK.PCK_0, SPACK.YPCKWID_0, SPACK.YPCKLEN_0, SPACK.YPCKHEI_0, SPACK.WEU_0 AS WEU_PCK, SPACK.NETWEI_0 AS NETWEI_SPK, SPACK.PACNUM_0, TEXCLOB_DEB.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DEB, TEXCLOB_DET.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DET, TEXCLOB_AUTREN.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_AUTREN FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERY SDELIVERY LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPCARRIER BPCARRIER ON SDELIVERY.BPTNUM_0 = BPCARRIER.BPTNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERYD SDELIVERYD ON SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0 = SDELIVERYD.SDHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER ON SDELIVERYD.SOHNUM_0 = SORDER.SOHNUM_0 INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON SDELIVERYD.ITMREF_0 = ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SERREQUEST SERREQUEST ON SDELIVERYD.YSOH_PJT_0 = SERREQUEST.SRENUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON SDELIVERYD.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SDELIVERYD.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACKD SPACKD ON SDELIVERYD.SDHNUM_0 = SPACKD.VCRNUM_0 AND SDELIVERYD.SDDLIN_0 = SPACKD.VCRLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACK SPACK ON SPACKD.PACNUM_0 = SPACK.PACNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DEB ON SDELIVERY.SDHTEX1_0=TEXCLOB_DEB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DET ON SDELIVERYD.SDDTEX_0=TEXCLOB_DET.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_AUTREN ON SORDERQ.YAUTREN_0=TEXCLOB_AUTREN.CODE_0 WHERE SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0 = #{DeliveryNo} ORDER BY SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0, SPACK.PACNUM_0, SORDER.SOHNUM_0, SPACKD.VCRLIN_0, SPACKD.SERNUM_0, SDELIVERYD.SDDLIN_0

SELECT DISTINCT FACILITY.FCYNAM_0 , PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSNDE_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 , PRECEIPT.INVFLG_0 , PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 , PRECEIPT.RCPDAT_0 , PRECEIPT.BPAADD_0 , PRECEIPT.BPONAM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_1 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_2 , PRECEIPT.BPOCRYNAM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOCTY_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOPOSCOD_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOSAT_0 , BPSUPPLIER.YBPS_PTE_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 , BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_0 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_1 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_1, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_2 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_2, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPADES_0 AS PAY_BPADES_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.CRYNAM_0 AS PAY_CRYNAM_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.CTY_0 AS PAY_CTY_0 , BPADDRESS_PAY.POSCOD_0 AS PAY_POSCOD_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.SAT_0 AS PAY_SAT_0, PORDER.POHNUM_0 , PORDER.ORDDAT_0 , PORDER.PTE_0 , PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 , PRECEIPTD.PTDLIN_0, PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0, PRECEIPTD.QTYSTU_0, PRECEIPTD.STU_0, PRECEIPTD.NETPRI_0, PRECEIPTD.LINAMT_0, PRECEIPTD.LINATIAMT_0, PRECEIPTD.NETCUR_0, PRECEIPTD.PJT_0, SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0, IsNull(SORDERQ.YSOH_ITEM_0,'') AS YSOH_ITEM_0, -- Without it, report cant work ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0, ITMFACILIT.REOCOD_0, ITMFACILIT.REOMGTCOD_0, ITMBPS.ITMREFBPS_0, STOJOU.STA_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.PRECEIPT PRECEIPT LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.FACILITY FACILITY ON PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 = FACILITY.FCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPSUPPLIER BPSUPPLIER ON PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 = BPSUPPLIER.BPSNUM_0 AND PRECEIPT.BPAADD_0 = BPSUPPLIER.BPAADD_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPSUPPLIER BPSUPPLIER_PAY ON PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 = BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPSNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPADDRESS BPADDRESS_PAY ON PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPANUM_0 AND BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPSTYP_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPATYP_0 AND BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPAPAY_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADD_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PRECEIPTD PRECEIPTD ON PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 = PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 AND PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 = PRECEIPTD.PTHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDER PORDER ON PRECEIPTD.POHNUM_0 = PORDER.POHNUM_0 AND PRECEIPTD.POHFCY_0 = PORDER.POHFCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDERQ PORDERQ ON PRECEIPTD.POHNUM_0 = PORDERQ.POHNUM_0 AND PRECEIPTD.POPLIN_0 = PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON PRECEIPTD.PJT_0 = SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AND PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 = SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AND PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMFACILIT ITMFACILIT ON PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = ITMFACILIT.ITMREF_0 AND PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 = ITMFACILIT.STOFCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMBPS ITMBPS ON ITMBPS.BPSNUM_0= PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 AND ITMBPS.ITMREF_0 = PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOJOU STOJOU ON STOJOU.ITMREF_0 = PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 AND STOJOU.STOFCY_0 = PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 AND STOJOU.VCRNUM_0 = PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 AND STOJOU.VCRLIN_0 = PRECEIPTD.PTDLIN_0 AND STOJOU.TRSTYP_0=3 WHERE PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0=#{ReceiptNO}

SELECT DISTINCT FACILITY.FCYNAM_0 , PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSNDE_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 , PRECEIPT.INVFLG_0 , PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 , PRECEIPT.RCPDAT_0 , PRECEIPT.BPAADD_0 , PRECEIPT.BPONAM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_1 , PRECEIPT.BPOADDLIG_2 , PRECEIPT.BPOCRYNAM_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOCTY_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOPOSCOD_0 , PRECEIPT.BPOSAT_0 , BPSUPPLIER.YBPS_PTE_0 , PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 , BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_0 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_1 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_1, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADDLIG_2 AS PAY_BPAADDLIG_2, BPADDRESS_PAY.BPADES_0 AS PAY_BPADES_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.CRYNAM_0 AS PAY_CRYNAM_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.CTY_0 AS PAY_CTY_0 , BPADDRESS_PAY.POSCOD_0 AS PAY_POSCOD_0, BPADDRESS_PAY.SAT_0 AS PAY_SAT_0, PORDER.POHNUM_0 , PORDER.ORDDAT_0 , PORDER.PTE_0 , PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 , PRECEIPTD.PTDLIN_0, PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0, PRECEIPTD.QTYSTU_0, PRECEIPTD.STU_0, PRECEIPTD.NETPRI_0, PRECEIPTD.LINAMT_0, PRECEIPTD.LINATIAMT_0, PRECEIPTD.NETCUR_0, PRECEIPTD.PJT_0, SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0, IsNull(SORDERQ.YSOH_ITEM_0,'') AS YSOH_ITEM_0, -- Without it, report cant work ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0, ITMFACILIT.REOCOD_0, ITMFACILIT.REOMGTCOD_0, ITMBPS.ITMREFBPS_0, STOJOU.STA_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.PRECEIPT PRECEIPT LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.FACILITY FACILITY ON PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 = FACILITY.FCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPSUPPLIER BPSUPPLIER ON PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 = BPSUPPLIER.BPSNUM_0 AND PRECEIPT.BPAADD_0 = BPSUPPLIER.BPAADD_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPSUPPLIER BPSUPPLIER_PAY ON PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 = BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPSNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPADDRESS BPADDRESS_PAY ON PRECEIPT.BPSINV_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPANUM_0 AND BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPSTYP_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPATYP_0 AND BPSUPPLIER_PAY.BPAPAY_0 = BPADDRESS_PAY.BPAADD_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PRECEIPTD PRECEIPTD ON PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 = PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 AND PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 = PRECEIPTD.PTHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDER PORDER ON PRECEIPTD.POHNUM_0 = PORDER.POHNUM_0 AND PRECEIPTD.POHFCY_0 = PORDER.POHFCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.PORDERQ PORDERQ ON PRECEIPTD.POHNUM_0 = PORDERQ.POHNUM_0 AND PRECEIPTD.POPLIN_0 = PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON PRECEIPTD.PJT_0 = SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AND PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 = SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AND PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMFACILIT ITMFACILIT ON PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 = ITMFACILIT.ITMREF_0 AND PRECEIPTD.PRHFCY_0 = ITMFACILIT.STOFCY_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMBPS ITMBPS ON ITMBPS.BPSNUM_0= PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0 AND ITMBPS.ITMREF_0 = PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.STOJOU STOJOU ON STOJOU.ITMREF_0 = PRECEIPTD.ITMREF_0 AND STOJOU.STOFCY_0 = PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0 AND STOJOU.VCRNUM_0 = PRECEIPT.PTHNUM_0 AND STOJOU.VCRLIN_0 = PRECEIPTD.PTDLIN_0 AND STOJOU.TRSTYP_0=3 WHERE PRECEIPT.PRHFCY_0=#{PurchaseSite} AND PRECEIPT.BPSNUM_0=#{VendorCode} AND PRECEIPT.RCPDAT_0 >= #{StartDay} AND PRECEIPT.RCPDAT_0 <= #{EndDay}

SELECT SINVOICE.FCY_0, SINVOICE.CUR_0, SINVOICE.NUM_0, SINVOICE.ACCDAT_0, SINVOICE.AMTATI_0, SINVOICE.AMTNOT_0, SINVOICE.AMTTAX_0, SINVOICE.RATMLT_3, SINVOICE.BPR_0, SINVOICE.YFAPIAO_0, SINVOICE.YSIH_CUSDOC_0, SINVOICE.YSIH_TRACK_0, SINVOICE.BPRNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPRNAM_1, SINVOICE.POSCOD_0, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_0, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_1, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_2, SINVOICE.CRY_0, SINVOICE.CTY_0, SINVOICE.SAT_0, SINVOICE.CRYNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPYNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPYNAM_1, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_0, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_1, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_2, SINVOICE.BPYPOSCOD_0, SINVOICE.BPYCTY_0, SINVOICE.BPYSAT_0, SINVOICE.BPYCRY_0, SINVOICE.BPYCRYNAM_0, SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0, SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0, SINVOICED.ITMREF_0, SINVOICED.ITMDES_0, SINVOICED.ITMDES2_0, SINVOICED.QTY_0, SINVOICED.SAU_0, SINVOICED.NETPRI_0, SINVOICEV.BPIEECNUM_0, SINVOICEV.EECICT_0, SINVOICEV.ICTCTY_0, SDELIVERY.SHIDAT_0, SDELIVERY.YBPDTRSP_0, SDELIVERYD.YSOH_ITEM_0, BPCARRIER.BPTNAM_0, ITMMASTER.CUSREF_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_IND_0, ITMMASTER.YITM_OTAN_0, ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0, SORDER.SOHNUM_0, SORDER.ORDDAT_0, SORDER.CUSORDREF_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_1, SORDER.BPCCTY_0, SORDER.BPCSAT_0, SORDER.BPCCRY_0, SORDER.BPCCRYNAM_0, SORDER.BPCPOSCOD_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_1, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_2, SORDERP.ITMDES3_0, SORDERP.SOQSTA_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_BPCPN_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_ITEMCUS_0, SPACK.PCK_0, SPACK.YPCKWID_0, SPACK.YPCKLEN_0, SPACK.YPCKHEI_0, SPACK.WEU_0 AS WEU_PCK, SPACK.NETWEI_0 AS NETWEI_SPK, SPACK.PACNUM_0, TEXCLOB_DEB.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DEB, TEXCLOB_DET.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DET, TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_SOH_DEB, SPACKD.SERNUM_0, SPACKD.LOT_0
FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICE SINVOICE LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICED SINVOICED ON SINVOICE.NUM_0= SINVOICED.NUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICEV SINVOICEV ON SINVOICEV.NUM_0 = SINVOICED.NUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERY SDELIVERY ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0= SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERYD SDELIVERYD ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0= SDELIVERYD.SDHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0= SDELIVERYD.SDDLIN_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPCARRIER BPCARRIER ON SDELIVERY.BPTNUM_0 = BPCARRIER.BPTNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON SINVOICED.ITMREF_0= ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SOPLIN_0= SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERP SORDERP ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SOQSEQ_0= SORDERP.SOPSEQ_0 AND SINVOICED.SOPLIN_0= SORDERP.SOPLIN_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACK SPACK ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0 = SPACK.VCRNUM_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DET ON SINVOICED.SIDTEX_0= TEXCLOB_DET.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB ON SORDER.SOHTEX1_0= TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DEB ON SINVOICEV.SIHTEX1_0= TEXCLOB_DEB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACKD SPACKD ON SPACKD.VCRNUM_0 = SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0 AND SPACKD.VCRLIN_0= SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0
WHERE SINVOICE.NUM_0 =#{InvoiceNO} ORDER BY SINVOICEV.NUM_0 DESC, SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0, SORDER.SOHNUM_0, SINVOICED.SIDLIN_0

SELECT NUM_0, DUDDAT_0, PAMTYP_0, PAM_0, CUR_0, AMTCUR_0, PAYCUR_0, TMPCUR_0 FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.GACCDUDATE GACCDUDATE WHERE GACCDUDATE.NUM_0=#{InvoiceNO}
ORDER BY DUDDAT_0 , DUDLIG_0

SELECT SINVOICE.FCY_0, SINVOICE.CUR_0, SINVOICE.NUM_0, SINVOICE.ACCDAT_0, SINVOICE.BPR_0, SINVOICE.YFAPIAO_0, SINVOICE.YSIH_CUSDOC_0, SINVOICE.YSIH_TRACK_0, SINVOICE.BPRNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPRNAM_1, SINVOICE.POSCOD_0, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_0, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_1, SINVOICE.BPAADDLIG_2, SINVOICE.CRY_0, SINVOICE.CTY_0, SINVOICE.SAT_0, SINVOICE.CRYNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPYNAM_0, SINVOICE.BPYNAM_1, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_0, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_1, SINVOICE.BPYADDLIG_2, SINVOICE.BPYPOSCOD_0, SINVOICE.BPYCTY_0, SINVOICE.BPYSAT_0, SINVOICE.BPYCRY_0, SINVOICE.BPYCRYNAM_0, SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0, SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0, SINVOICED.ITMREF_0, SINVOICED.ITMDES_0, SINVOICED.ITMDES2_0, SINVOICED.QTY_0, SINVOICED.SAU_0, SINVOICED.NETPRI_0, SINVOICED.AMTTAXLIN_0, SINVOICED.AMTATILIN_0, SINVOICED.AMTNOTLIN_0, SINVOICED.RATTAXLIN_0, SINVOICEV.BPIEECNUM_0, SINVOICEV.EECICT_0, SINVOICEV.ICTCTY_0, SDELIVERY.SHIDAT_0, SDELIVERY.YBPDTRSP_0, SDELIVERYD.YSOH_ITEM_0, BPCARRIER.BPTNAM_0, ITMMASTER.CUSREF_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_IND_0, ITMMASTER.YITM_OTAN_0, ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0, ITMMASTER.XITM_RACIN_0, SORDER.SOHNUM_0, SORDER.ORDDAT_0, SORDER.CUSORDREF_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_0, SORDER.BPCNAM_1, SORDER.BPCCTY_0, SORDER.BPCSAT_0, SORDER.BPCCRY_0, SORDER.BPCCRYNAM_0, SORDER.BPCPOSCOD_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_0, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_1, SORDER.BPCADDLIG_2, SORDERP.ITMDES3_0, SORDERP.SOQSTA_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_BPCPN_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_ITEMCUS_0, SPACK.PCK_0, SPACK.YPCKWID_0, SPACK.YPCKLEN_0, SPACK.YPCKHEI_0, SPACK.WEU_0 AS WEU_PCK, SPACK.NETWEI_0 AS NETWEI_SPK, SPACK.PACNUM_0, TEXCLOB_DEB.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DEB, TEXCLOB_DET.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_DET, TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB.TEXTE_0 AS TEXT_SOH_DEB, SPACKD.SERNUM_0, SPACKD.LOT_0
FROM x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICE SINVOICE LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICED SINVOICED ON SINVOICE.NUM_0= SINVOICED.NUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICEV SINVOICEV ON SINVOICEV.NUM_0 = SINVOICED.NUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERY SDELIVERY ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0= SDELIVERY.SDHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SDELIVERYD SDELIVERYD ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0= SDELIVERYD.SDHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0= SDELIVERYD.SDDLIN_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.BPCARRIER BPCARRIER ON SDELIVERY.BPTNUM_0 = BPCARRIER.BPTNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER ITMMASTER ON SINVOICED.ITMREF_0= ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERQ SORDERQ ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SOPLIN_0= SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDERP SORDERP ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AND SINVOICED.SOQSEQ_0= SORDERP.SOPSEQ_0 AND SINVOICED.SOPLIN_0= SORDERP.SOPLIN_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACK SPACK ON SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0 = SPACK.VCRNUM_0
LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DET ON SINVOICED.SIDTEX_0= TEXCLOB_DET.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB ON SORDER.SOHTEX1_0= TEXCLOB_SOH_DEB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.TEXCLOB TEXCLOB_DEB ON SINVOICEV.SIHTEX1_0= TEXCLOB_DEB.CODE_0 LEFT JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SPACKD SPACKD ON SPACKD.VCRNUM_0 = SINVOICED.SDHNUM_0 AND SPACKD.VCRLIN_0= SINVOICED.SDDLIN_0 WHERE SORDER.SOHNUM_0 =#{OrderNO} OR SORDER.CUSORDREF_0=#{OrderNO}

SELECT DISTINCT GACCDUDATE.NUM_0, GACCDUDATE.DUDDAT_0, GACCDUDATE.PAMTYP_0, GACCDUDATE.PAM_0, GACCDUDATE.CUR_0, GACCDUDATE.AMTCUR_0, GACCDUDATE.PAYCUR_0, GACCDUDATE.TMPCUR_0 FROM EXPLOIT.GACCDUDATE GACCDUDATE INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SINVOICED SINVOICED ON GACCDUDATE.NUM_0= SINVOICED.NUM_0 INNER JOIN x3sql.EXPLOIT.SORDER SORDER ON SINVOICED.SOHNUM_0= SORDER.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDER.SOHNUM_0 =#{OrderNO} OR SORDER.CUSORDREF_0=#{OrderNO}
